prop.name: departureStation
prop.desc: The station from which the train departs.

prop.name: provider
prop.desc: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.

prop.name: arrivalPlatform
prop.desc: The platform where the train arrives.

prop.name: departurePlatform
prop.desc: The platform from which the train departs.

prop.name: trainName
prop.desc: The name of the train (e.g. The Orient Express).

prop.name: trainNumber
prop.desc: The unique identifier for the train.

prop.name: arrivalStation
prop.desc: The station where the train trip ends.
